author: Anton Petrov
description:
Support this channel on Patreon to help me make this a full time job: https://www.patreon.com/whatdamath (Unreleased videos, extra footage, DMs, no ads)

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about the 2024 Gannon Megastorm and how it affected Earth
Links:
https://link.springer.com/article/10.1186/s40623-025-02317-3
https://www.noaa.gov/heritage/stories/five-historically-huge-solar-events
Other videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GCC19IS0_Zc

#gannon #solarstorm #magnetosphere 

0:00 Massive 2024 Geomagnetic Superstorm 
1:30 Solar flares and coronal mass ejections 
2:50 How strong was this? 
4:40 Satellite observations suggest major plasmasphere changes 
7:18 Sporadic E layer changes 
9:05 Important test of technology 
10:20 Conclusions

Enjoy and ple
title: Most Intense Solar Storm in Decades Shrunk Earth's Defense by 80%
